Subject: Re: To base.
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Speedbreaker arrives to, with the last load of energon. He transforms, and
starts to pile them up, "I'll refule the base" he says, then he notices
smoke rising from the forest just ahead of them. He pulls out his laser
rifle and cocks it, waiting attack, but he relaxes when he hears crashing
noises, and a wild cackle. He turns to Dead-End, "The boys are back" he
exclaims, as the trees give away to two speeding cars.
